2. Mueller wants to avoid that. He gives his report to DOJ and says nothing.
3. Dems see that as a double standard.
4. Hence the subpoena. Dems want to force Mueller to blab, too.

If those parts aren't released, everyone who isn't charged, possibly including Trump, will claim exoneration.

text:
Once, while coaching 8th grade basketball, I tried chewing out my players.

Result: My point guard hit the backboard with his inbounds pass. My small forward caught a rebound and attempted a putback ... in the wrong basket.

Don't do it. It just rattles your team.

text:
I endorsed the use of force because of Saddam's systematic obstruction of the UN weapons inspectors. I took that as a sign of guilt.

Later, in shock, I read a NYT story about how Saddam had been trying to conceal that he did NOT have WMD. That possibility hadn't occurred to me.

text: There's a good case to be made for Western civilization. And when you're offered "white/nonwhite" instead, that's your cue to say that ideals and rules, not color, are what matter. So you start by saying "No," and then you can make the points he made. But he won't.

text:
King said:
1) "America ... has never been a completely white society. We came here and joined the Native Americans.”
2) "A baby [from] anywhere ... can be raised to be American as any other."
3) "Every one of us are created in God’s image.”

So why not start the answer with "No"?

text: Economically, he advocates left populism: unionize workers, raise the minimum wage. That's only for whites, since he's a racist, not a progressive. But he does call imported nonwhite workers "modern slaves." /9
author: saletan

text: He claims to stand for "environmentalism" and "green nationalism." Says the planet can't properly support 10 billion people. This holds him back from advocating sheer white procreation. Instead, he advocates subtraction through mass murder. /8
author: saletan

text: He defines whites broadly: Bavarians, Poles, Estonians, Venezuelans. Seems uninterested in drawing cultural or biological distinctions among these groups. Rules out "Han Chinese" but says China is "the nation with the closest political and social values to my own." /7
author: saletan

text: He tries to recast white nationalism as a kind of "diversity." A "rainbow" of separate colors. You stay in your band, he implies, and I'll stay in mine. /6
author: saletan

text: He agrees with critiques of systemic racism. That's why he dreads becoming a minority. He also talks about the plight of linguistic minorities: "The conversation of life excludes them, the mass media isolates them and businesses turn them away." /5
author: saletan

text: He frets that whites will "find their very own genes being bred out of existence," in part "through miscegenation." Clings to this idea of protecting white genes from being diffused through the population, and thereby somehow lost. /4
author: saletan

text: He was radicalized by ... shopping. Outraged to see Muslims peacefully walking into French stores and exchanging money for goods. It's the bourgeois normality that infuriates him. /3

text: Yes. That series of answers is sarcastic. E.g., the next one: "Were you taught violence and extremism by video games?" "Yes, Spyro the dragon 3 taught me ethno-nationalism. Fortnite trained me to be a killer and to floss on the corpses of my enemies. No."
